text: Bankovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Yangurchinsky Selsoviet, Sterlibashevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 26 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 18 km from Sterlibashevo, 7 km from Yangurcha. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlibashevsky District
title: Bankovka
